channel.title: startup on Laurent Parenteau
channel.description: Recent content in startup on Laurent Parenteau

item.title: Exponential Growth: Myth, Reality, and Strategic Considerations
item.description: While exponential growth demonstrates immense potential, it is crucial to realistically assess growth rates, sustainability, and timeframes to avoid overestimating outcomes and sometimes consider high-risk strategies instead.

item.title: The Tragic Tale of King Han: The Consequences of Ignored Counsel
item.description: In the kingdom of Wisdom Peak, King Han’s tragic tale illustrates the perils of ignoring wise counsel and succumbing to the allure of shortcuts, emphasizing the importance for leaders to trust their own judgment and balance risk-taking with prudence.

item.title: Picking the Right Tool for a Remote Engineering Team
item.description: How to pick the right project management tools by trials and gathering feedback, highlighting the value of adaptive learning and experimentation in process improvement.

item.title: Minimal Tool Box for Remote Startups
item.description: The only three communication tools that are crucial for remote startups to establish clarity, team cohesion, and productivity from the outset, advocating for starting with minimal tools and adjusting as the team grows.

item.title: Building Your Initial Engineering Team
item.description: How I successfully built a strong initial team by prioritizing cultural fit alongside technical skills, ensuring the team could effectively navigate early challenges.
